name: Hunter Burke
biography: Hunter Burke is an actor and writer, known for Sweet Magnolias (2020), The Big Short (2015) and Claws (2017).::Anonymous
trivia: Sister, Darci, graduated from the University of Arizona with a BFA in Dance, and went on to perform in popular Las Vegas shows Folies Bergere and Jubilee. For three years, she was also a Radio City Rockette.
Started acting in sister's dance reviews at a young age.
Graduated from the University of Louisiana at Lafayette with a BFA in Theatre.
filmography: The Haunting in Connecticut 2: Ghosts of Georgia
The Loss of a Teardrop Diamond
